actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution authorizing and requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating June 23, 1975, as "International Ladies' Garment Workers' Union Day" to celebrate the occasion of the 75th anniversary of that union.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue a proclamation designating June 23, 1975, as "International Ladies' Garment Workers' Union Day" to celebrate the occasion of the 75th anniversary of that union.

titles.title: A joint resolution authorizing and requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating June 23, 1975, as "International Ladies' Garment Workers' Union Day" to celebrate the occasion of the 75th anniversary of that union.
